entries.name: stardist-cell-nuclei-2D
entries.description: Cell microscopy test dataset for detection and segmentation of individual nuclei

entries.name: oppd-seedlings
entries.description: The Open Plant Phenotyping Database [OPPD] is a public dataset for visual recognition tasks on images of plant seedlings. The dataset consists of 7,590 images with 315,038 plant objects, representing 64,292 individual plants from 47 different species. Each plant species has been cultivated using three growth conditions (ideal, drought and natural) and tracked temporally to achieve high intra-species variability.

entries.name: scivision-test-data
entries.description: Test data comprised of individual images including a Koala (suitable for classification), a busy airport (suitable for object detection), and an image containing a Dog and a Cat (suitable for segmentation).

entries.name: cefas-plankton
entries.description: Sample dataset of Plankton required to demonstrate the Rapid Identification of Plankton using Machine Learning Project undertaken by CEFAS, The Alan Turing Institute and Plankton Analytics Ltd
institution: Centre for Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture Science (CEFAS)

entries.name: coastal-edges
entries.description: Sample dataset of satellite RGB imagery over two coastal locations bribie_island (RapidEye) and winterton (Planet) used to test the VEdge_Detector model described in Rogers et al (2021)

entries.name: treecrowns
entries.description: Sample dataset of drone RGB imagery over Sepilok Forest Reserve, in Sabah, Malaysia, collected and processed by NERC and NEODAAS as part of Sebastian Hickmanâ€™s (2021) AI4ER MRes Project, Cambridge University

entries.name: sentinel2_stac
entries.description: Data plugin for accessing Sentinel-2 Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs via scivision. The Sentinel-2 mission is a land monitoring constellation of two satellites that provide high resolution optical imagery and provide continuity for the current SPOT and Landsat missions. The mission provides a global coverage of the Earth's land surface every 5 days, making the data of great use in ongoing studies. This dataset is the same as the Sentinel-2 dataset, except the JP2K files were converted into Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs). Additionally, SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog metadata has were in a JSON file alongside the data, and a STAC API called Earth-search is freely available to search the archive. This dataset contains all of the scenes in the original Sentinel-2 Public Dataset and will grow as that does. L2A data are available from April 2017 over wider Europe region and globally since December 2018.

entries.name: flowers
entries.description: The 102 flowers dataset, created by Visual Geometry Group, by Maria-Elena Nilsback and Andrew Zisserman. 8000 images of flowers, plus labels indicating their species

entries.name: butterflies
entries.description: The Butterfly Image Classification Kaggle challenge, created by Gerald Piosenka.

entries.name: cell-cycle-scivision
entries.description: Crops of H2B-FP stained nuclei in MDCK cells.
